key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny around consumer lending practices and data privacy
Economic sensitivity tied to consumer spending and interest rates
High debt levels and rising net charge-offs
Intense competition from fintech startups and established financial institutions
Significant exposure to subprime consumers and associated credit risk
controversies: Reliance on late fees from subprime consumers raising reputational concerns
Ongoing regulatory challenges impacting compliance costs and operations
social_issues: Potential harm to subprime consumers due to reliance on late fees
governance_issues: Concerns over debt management and financial stability in volatile markets
